about_the_game:
Marrakech hospital was taken by evil. A doctor who was raised by demons and born to be a problem to the world is hidden inside the hospital invoking evil creatures. Jack was called because he is the only one capable to defeat him. Use a blessed AK and other weapons to defeat these evil creatures who won't stop for nothing until they destroy all the good living things on the planet. Defeat the creatures before they get out and spread to the city. Pacients inside are surrounded by these creatures and you are their only hope.


First game of the series Marrakech. Game in first person. Shoot demons with modern blessed weapons and save the patients. It's just another day in Jack's
demons hunter life.

Evil creatures will go after you when you get too close and chase you until you are down.
Intense and dark game. Every corner danger will be closer.
If you are a lightweight gameplayer this game may be too intense for you : )
Game contains some nude (buttocks exposed) and violence acts against creatures with human shape as shows weapons not indicated for kids view.
Keyboard and mouse to control and move the character.
Left click to shoot.
Esc to access the menu.
Other instructions at the beginning of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains some nude (buttocks exposed) and violence acts against creatures with human shape as shows weapons not indicated for kids view.

name: Marrakech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2330M CPU @ 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U CPU @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: There is a doctor possessed by demons inside Marrakech hospital, he is invoking evil creatures. Pacientes inside need your help. Use a blessed Ak and defeat the creatures that comes your way.
